statements: UPDATE drug_interactions SET side_effects = 'dizziness' WHERE interaction_id = 1;
UPDATE drug_interactions SET interaction_description = 'may cause nausea' WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin';
UPDATE drug_interactions SET side_effects = 'Nausea, Headache' WHERE interaction_id = 1;
UPDATE drug_interactions SET interaction_description = 'Severe interaction with alcohol' WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin';
UPDATE Drug_Interactions SET drug_name='Painkiller' WHERE drug_id=1
UPDATE Side_Effects SET side_effect_name='Nausea' WHERE drug_id=1
UPDATE Drug_Interactions SET drug_name = 'Aspirin', interaction_with = 'Ibuprofen' WHERE drug_id = 1;
UPDATE Side_Effects SET side_effect_name = 'Headache' WHERE drug_id = 2;
UPDATE drug_interactions SET interaction_type = 'Severe' WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin';
UPDATE side_effects SET frequency = 'High' WHERE side_effect = 'Nausea';
UPDATE drug_interactions SET severity='High' WHERE drug_name='Paracetamol' AND interaction_type='Liver Damage';

UPDATE medication_safety SET interaction_id=(SELECT id FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_name='Aspirin' AND interaction_type='Bleeding'), side_effect_id=(SELECT id FROM side_effects WHERE drug_name='Aspirin' AND side_effect='Headache') WHERE patient_id=123;
UPDATE drug_interactions SET interaction_description = 'Severe interaction' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE drugs SET manufacturer = 'ABC Pharma' WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin';
UPDATE drug_interactions SET interaction_description = 'Severe interaction between drug A and drug B' WHERE drug1_id = 1 AND drug2_id = 2;
UPDATE drugs SET dosage = '20mg' WHERE drug_name = 'Drug X';
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type = 'Severe' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE medications SET dosage = '2 pills daily' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type = 'Moderate' WHERE drug1 = 'Aspirin' AND drug2 = 'Ibuprofen';
UPDATE prescriptions SET dosage_instructions = 'Take 1 tablet daily with food' WHERE patient_id = 123 AND medication_id = 456;
